warpworld_username.label: Warp World Username
warpworld_username.tooltip: The emoticon or text that will be used when the user wins

warpworld_key.label: Warp World Key
warpworld_key.tooltip: You can get this from your Warp Bar URL, look for key= at the end of the URL.

command_character.label: Command character
command_character.tooltip: What character should commands start with, for example if you enter !, commands will be in the form !command

permission_join.label: Join/Leave Queue Permission level
permission_join.tooltip: Set the permission level required to join the queue

permission_next.label: Permission level to modify the queue (next/subnext/random/etc)
permission_next.tooltip: Set the permission level required to join the queue
